title: Motorway Cops: Catching America's Speeders
overview: Follow New Jersey police as they tackle drunk, drugged, and reckless driving. With the highest traffic-related deaths in 15 years, New Jersey has a lot at stake. We gain unique access to two police departments, where cameras reveal the daily challenges faced by officers striving to maintain safety on the 39,000 miles of highway. From dashcam footage showing shocking incidents nationwide to the humorous moments on the job, witness the chaotic reality of policing as in Clifton, New Jersey.
